headline: Caterpillar Announces Executive Officer Retirement
summary: IRVING, Texas, Jan. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Caterpillar Inc. today announced Chief Human Resources Officer Cheryl H. Johnson will retire April 30 following an impactful seven-year career at the...
